summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of East & West Green Lake Boulevard, from North Seventy-seventh Street to North Sixty-fifth Street, et al in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks under Ordinance No. 23919, creating Local Improvement District No. 2316 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
